alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 24 at 6:30PM MST until July 24 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR ANTELOPE CANYON REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM ARIZONA TIME... At 627 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing rain over Antelope Canyon. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Antelope Creek basin. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding in Antelope Canyon. This includes the following slot canyons... Upper Antelope Canyon, Lower Antelope Canyon, Canyon X, Cardiac Canyon, Owl Canyon, Rattlesnake Canyon, Mountain Sheep Canyon, Ramshead Canyon, Wind Pebble Canyon and Porcupine Canyon. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Get out of Antelope Canyon and other area slot canyons immediately! Deadly flash flooding is imminent or occurring! Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life. Get out of washes and creeks if you are camping or hiking! Flooding is occurring or imminent and will inundate area drainages.
